'''2.2.8351''' ({{w|Microsoft Windows|Windows}}), '''2.2.8352''' ({{w|Microsoft Windows|Windows}}, via the {{w|Microsoft Store}}/{{W|Xbox (app)|Xbox app}}), '''2.2.8353''' ({{w|macOS}}), or '''2.2.8354''' ({{w|Linux}}), is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on December 14, 2021.

== Changes ==
* Update for Dungeons Cloudy Climb event.
* Corrected Minecraft logo art here and there throughout the Launcher.

== Fixes ==
* {{Bug|MCL-20580}} - Player can't uninstall the Minecraft Dungeons gamefiles.
* {{Bug|MCL-20795}} - Cannot install Minecraft for Windows. "Error" in progress bar.</onlyinclude>
